Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarLocationCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a location request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarBeaconCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a beacon ranging request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarTrackCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a track request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarTripCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a trip update succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarContextCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a context request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarSearchPlacesCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a place search request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarSearchGeofencesCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a geofence search request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarGeocodeCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a geocoding request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarIPGeocodeCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when an IP geocoding request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarRouteCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a distance request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.name: RadarRouteMatrixCompletionHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:Radar.h@T@Rad.abstract: Called when a matrix request succeeds, fails, or times out.

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -didReceiveEvents:user:
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Tells the delegate that events were received.

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -didUpdateLocation:user:
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Tells the delegate that the current user’s location was updated and synced to the server.

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -didUpdateClientLocation:stopped:source:
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Tells the delegate that the client’s location was updated but not necessarily synced to the server. To receive only server-synced location updates and user

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -didFailWithStatus:
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Tells the delegate that a request failed.

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -didLogMessage:
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Tells the delegate that a debug log message was received.

Protocols/RadarDelegate.html.name: RadarDelegate
Protocols/RadarDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate for client-side delivery of events, location updates, and debug logs. For more information, see https://radar.io/documentation/sdk/ios

Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..name: RadarTrackingOptionsSyncAll
Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..abstract: Syncs all location updates to the server

Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..name: RadarTrackingOptionsSyncStopsAndExits
Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..abstract: Syncs only stops and exits to the server

Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..name: RadarTrackingOptionsSyncNone
Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsSyncLocations..abstract: Syncs no location updates to the server

Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsReplay.html.name: RadarTrackingOptionsReplay
Enums/RadarTrackingOptionsReplay.html.abstract: The replay options for failed location updates.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.name: home
Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user is at home, based on learned home location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.name: office
Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user is at the office, based on learned office location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.name: traveling
Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user is traveling, based on learned home location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.name: commuting
Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html#/c:o.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user is commuting, based on learned home location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: confidence
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The confidence level of the learned location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: updatedAt
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The datetime when the learned location was updated.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: country
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The country of the learned location. May be nil if country is not available or if regions are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: state
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The state of the learned location. May be nil if state is not available or if regions are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: dma
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The DMA of the learned location. May be nil if DMA is not available or if regions are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.name: postalCode
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html#/.abstract: The postal code of the learned location. May be nil if postal code is not available or if regions are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.name: homeLocation
Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The learned home location of the user. May be nil if not yet learned, or if Insights is turned off.

Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.name: officeLocation
Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The learned office location of the user. May be nil if not yet learned, or if Insights is turned off.

Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.name: state
Classes/RadarUserInsights.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The state of the user, based on learned home and office locations.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: _id
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The Radar ID of the user.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: userId
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The unique ID of the user, provided when you identified the user. May be nil if the user has not been identified.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: deviceId
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The device ID of the user.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: __description
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The optional description of the user. Not to be confused with the NSObject description property.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: metadata
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the user.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: location
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current location.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: geofences
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: An array of the user’s current geofences. May be nil or empty if the user is not in any geofences.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: place
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current place. May be nil if the user is not at a place or if Places is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: insights
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: Learned insights for the user. May be nil if no insights are available or if Insights is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: beacons
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: An array of the user’s nearby beacons. May be nil or empty if the user is not near any beacons or if Beacons is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: stopped
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user is stopped.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: foreground
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user was last updated in the foreground.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: country
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current country. May be nil if country is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: state
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current state. May be nil if state is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: dma
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current designated market area (DMA). May be nil if DMA is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: postalCode
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current postal code. May be nil if postal code is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: nearbyPlaceChains
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s nearby chains. May be nil if no chains are nearby or if nearby chains are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: segments
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s segments. May be nil if segments are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: topChains
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s nearby chains. May be nil if segments are not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: source
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The source of the user’s current location.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: proxy
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the user’s IP address is a known proxy. May be false if Fraud is not enabled.

Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.name: trip
Classes/RadarUser.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarU.abstract: The user’s current trip.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.name: externalId
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: A stable unique ID for the trip.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.name: metadata
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: An optional set of custom key-value pairs for the trip.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.name: destinationGeofenceTag
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: For trips with a destination, the tag of the destination geofence.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.name: destinationGeofenceExternalId
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: For trips with a destination, the external ID of the destination geofence.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.name: mode
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: For trips with a destination, the travel mode.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: metadata
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the trip.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: destinationGeofenceTag
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: For trips with a destination, the tag of the destination geofence.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: destinationGeofenceExternalId
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: For trips with a destination, the external ID of the destination geofence.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: destinationLocation
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: For trips with a destination, the location of the destination geofence.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: etaDistance
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: For trips with a destination, the distance to the destination geofence in meters based on the travel mode for the trip.

Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.name: etaDuration
Classes/RadarTrip.html#/c:objc(cs)RadarT.abstract: For trips with a destination, the ETA to the destination geofence in minutes based on the travel mode for the trip.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: desiredStoppedUpdateInterval
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the desired location update interval in seconds when stopped. Use 0 to shut down when stopped.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: desiredMovingUpdateInterval
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the desired location update interval in seconds when moving.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: desiredSyncInterval
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the desired sync interval in seconds.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: desiredAccuracy
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the desired accuracy of location updates.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: stopDuration
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: With stopDistance, determines the duration in seconds after which the device is considered stopped.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: stopDistance
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: With stopDuration, determines the distance in meters within which the device is considered stopped.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: startTrackingAfter
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines when to start tracking. Use nil to start tracking when startTracking is called.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: stopTrackingAfter
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines when to stop tracking. Use nil to track until stopTracking is called.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: replay
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines which failed location updates to replay to the server.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: syncLocations
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines which location updates to sync to the server.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: showBlueBar
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether the flashing blue status bar is shown when tracking.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: useStoppedGeofence
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to use the iOS region monitoring service (geofencing) to create a client geofence around the device’s current location when stopped.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: stoppedGeofenceRadius
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the radius in meters of the client geofence around the device’s current location when stopped.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: useMovingGeofence
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to use the iOS region monitoring service (geofencing) to create a client geofence around the device’s current location when moving.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: movingGeofenceRadius
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines the radius in meters of the client geofence around the device’s current location when moving.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: syncGeofences
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to sync nearby geofences from the server to the client to improve responsiveness.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: useVisits
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to use the iOS visit monitoring service.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: useSignificantLocationChanges
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to use the iOS significant location change service.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: beacons
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Determines whether to monitor beacons.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: presetContinuous
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Updates about every 30 seconds while moving or stopped. Moderate battery usage. Shows the flashing blue status bar during tracking.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: presetResponsive
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Updates about every 2.5 minutes when moving and shuts down when stopped to save battery. Once stopped, the device will need to move more than 100 meters to wake up and start

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.name: presetEfficient
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html#/c:obj.abstract: Uses the iOS visit monitoring service to update only on stops and exits. Once stopped, the device will need to move several hundred meters and trigger a visit departure to wake up

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: geodesic
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The geodesic distance between the origin and destination.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: foot
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The route by foot between the origin and destination. May be nil if mode not specified or route unavailable.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: bike
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The route by bike between the origin and destination. May be nil if mode not specified or route unavailable.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: car
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The route by car between the origin and destination. May be nil if mode not specified or route unavailable.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: truck
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The route by truck between the origin and destination. May be nil if mode not specified or route unavailable.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: motorbike
Classes/RadarRoutes.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The route by motorbike between the origin and destination. May be nil if mode not specified or route unavailable.

Classes/RadarRouteMatrix.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -routeBetweenOriginIndex:destinationIndex:
Classes/RadarRouteMatrix.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Returns the route between the specified origin and destination.

Classes/RadarRouteDistance.html#/c:objc(.name: value
Classes/RadarRouteDistance.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The distance in feet (for imperial units) or meters (for metric units).

Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.name: _coordinates
Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.abstract: The geometry of the polygon geofence. A closed ring of coordinates.

Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.name: center
Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.abstract: The calculated centroid of the polygon geofence.

Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.name: radius
Classes/RadarPolygonGeometry.html#/c:obj.abstract: The calculated radius of the polygon geofence in meters.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: categories
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The categories of the place. For a full list of categories, see https://radar.io/documentation/places/categories.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: chain
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The chain of the place, if known. May be nil for places without a chain. For a full list of chains, see https://radar.io/documentation/places/chains.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: group
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The group for the place, if any. For a full list of groups, see https://radar.io/documentation/places/groups.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: metadata
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The metadata for the place, if part of a group. For details of metadata fields see https://radar.io/documentation/places/groups.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: -isChain:
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: Returns a boolean indicating whether the place is part of the specified chain.

Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: -hasCategory:
Classes/RadarPlace.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: Returns a boolean indicating whether the place has the specified category.

Classes/RadarGeofence.html#/c:objc(cs)Ra.name: __description
Classes/RadarGeofence.html#/c:objc(cs)Ra.abstract: The description of the geofence. Not to be confused with the NSObject description property.

Classes/RadarGeofence.html#/c:objc(cs)Ra.name: metadata
Classes/RadarGeofence.html#/c:objc(cs)Ra.abstract: The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the geofence.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: createdAt
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The datetime when the event occurred on the device.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: actualCreatedAt
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The datetime when the event was created on the server.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: live
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: A boolean indicating whether the event was generated with your live API key.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: geofence
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The geofence for which the event was generated. May be nil for non-geofence events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: place
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The place for which the event was generated. May be nil for non-place events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: region
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The region for which the event was generated. May be null for non-region events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: beacon
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The beacon for which the event was generated. May be nil for non-beacon events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: trip
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The trip for which the event was generated. May be nil for non-trip events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: alternatePlaces
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: For place entry events, alternate place candidates. May be nil for non-place events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: verifiedPlace
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: For accepted place entry events, the verified place. May be nil for non-place events or unverified events.

Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: duration
Classes/RadarEvent.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The duration between entry and exit events, in minutes, for exit events. 0 for entry events.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: geofences
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: An array of the geofences for the location. May be empty if the location is not in any geofences.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: place
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The place for the location. May be nil if the location is not at a place or if Places is not enabled.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: country
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The country of the location. May be nil if country is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: state
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The state of the location. May be nil if state is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: dma
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The designated market area (DMA) of the location. May be nil if DMA is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: postalCode
Classes/RadarContext.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The postal code of the location. May be nil if postal code is not available or if Regions is not enabled.

Classes/RadarCircleGeometry.html#/c:objc.name: radius
Classes/RadarCircleGeometry.html#/c:objc.abstract: The radius of the circle geofence in meters.

Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: slug
Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The unique ID of the chain. For a full list of chains, see https://radar.io/documentation/places/chains.

Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: name
Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The name of the chain. For a full list of chains, see https://radar.io/documentation/places/chains.

Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.name: metadata
Classes/RadarChain.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar.abstract: The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the chain.

Classes/RadarBeacon.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: __description
Classes/RadarBeacon.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The description of the beacon. Not to be confused with the NSObject description property.

Classes/RadarBeacon.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.name: metadata
Classes/RadarBeacon.html#/c:objc(cs)Rada.abstract: The optional set of custom key-value pairs for the beacon.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: formattedAddress
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The formatted string representation of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: country
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The name of the country of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: countryCode
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The unique code of the country of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: countryFlag
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The flag of the country of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: dma
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The name of the DMA of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: dmaCode
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The unique code of the DMA of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: state
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The name of the state of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: stateCode
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The unique code of the state of the address.

Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.name: confidence
Classes/RadarAddress.html#/c:objc(cs)Rad.abstract: The confidence level of the geocoding result.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +setDescription:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Sets an optional description for the user, displayed in the dashboard.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +setMetadata:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Sets an optional set of custom key-value pairs for the user.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getLocationWithDesiredAccuracy:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Gets the device’s current location with the desired accuracy.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)t.name: +trackOnceWithCompletionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)t.abstract: Tracks the user’s location once in the foreground.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)t.name: +trackOnceWithDesiredAccuracy:beacons:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)t.abstract: Tracks the user’s location once with the desired accuracy and optionally ranges beacons in the foreground.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +startTrackingWithOptions:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Starts tracking the user’s location in the background with configurable tracking options.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)m.name: +mockTrackingWithOrigin:destination:mode:steps:interval:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)m.abstract: Mocks tracking the user’s location from an origin to a destination.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +stopTracking
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Stops tracking the user’s location in the background.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)i.name: +isTracking
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)i.abstract: Returns a boolean indicating whether tracking has been started.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +setDelegate:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Sets a delegate for client-side delivery of events, location updates, and debug logs.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.name: +acceptEventId:verifiedPlaceId:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.abstract: Accepts an event. Events can be accepted after user check-ins or other forms of verification. Event verifications will be used to improve the accuracy and

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.name: +rejectEventId:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.abstract: Rejects an event. Events can be accepted after user check-ins or other forms of verification. Event verifications will be used to improve the accuracy and

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getContextWithCompletionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Gets the device’s current location, then gets context for that location without sending device or user identifiers to the server.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getContextForLocation:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Gets context for a location without sending device or user identifiers to the server.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +searchPlacesWithRadius:chains:categories:groups:limit:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Gets the device’s current location, then searches for places near that location, sorted by distance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +searchPlacesNear:radius:chains:categories:groups:limit:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Searches for places near a location, sorted by distance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +searchGeofencesWithRadius:tags:metadata:limit:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Gets the device’s current location, then searches for geofences near that location, sorted by distance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +searchGeofencesNear:radius:tags:metadata:limit:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Searches for geofences near a location, sorted by distance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.name: +autocompleteQuery:near:layers:limit:country:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.abstract: Autocompletes partial addresses and place names, sorted by relevance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.name: +autocompleteQuery:near:limit:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)a.abstract: Autocompletes partial addresses and place names, sorted by relevance.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +geocodeAddress:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Geocodes an address, converting address to coordinates.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.name: +reverseGeocodeWithCompletionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.abstract: Gets the device’s current location, then reverse geocodes that location, converting coordinates to address.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.name: +reverseGeocodeLocation:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)r.abstract: Reverse geocodes a location, converting coordinates to address.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)i.name: +ipGeocodeWithCompletionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)i.abstract: Geocodes the device’s current IP address, converting IP address to partial address.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getDistanceToDestination:modes:units:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Gets the device’s current location, then calculates the travel distance and duration to a destination.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getDistanceFromOrigin:destination:modes:units:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Calculates the travel distance and duration from an origin to a destination.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.name: +getMatrixFromOrigins:destinations:mode:units:completionHandler:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)g.abstract: Calculates the travel distances and durations between multiple origins and destinations for up to 25 routes.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +setLogLevel:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Sets the log level for debug logs.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +stringForStatus:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Returns a display string for a status value.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +stringForLocationSource:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Returns a display string for a location source value.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +stringForMode:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Returns a display string for a travel mode value.

Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.name: +stringForTripStatus:
Classes/Radar.html#/c:objc(cs)Radar(cm)s.abstract: Returns a display string for a trip status value.

Classes/Radar.html.name: Radar
Classes/Radar.html.abstract: The main class used to interact with the Radar SDK.

Classes/RadarCircleGeometry.html.name: RadarCircleGeometry
Classes/RadarCircleGeometry.html.abstract: Represents the geometry of a circle geofence.

Classes/RadarRoute.html.name: RadarRoute
Classes/RadarRoute.html.abstract: Represents a route between an origin and a destination.

Classes/RadarRouteMatrix.html.name: RadarRouteMatrix
Classes/RadarRouteMatrix.html.abstract: Represents routes between multiple origins and destinations.

Classes/RadarRoutes.html.name: RadarRoutes
Classes/RadarRoutes.html.abstract: Represents routes from an origin to a destination.

Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html.name: RadarTrackingOptions
Classes/RadarTrackingOptions.html.abstract: An options class used to configure background tracking.

Classes/RadarTripOptions.html.name: RadarTripOptions
Classes/RadarTripOptions.html.abstract: An options class used to configure trip tracking.

Classes/RadarUserInsights.html.name: RadarUserInsights
Classes/RadarUserInsights.html.abstract: Represents the learned home, work, traveling and commuting state and locations of the current user.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html.name: RadarUserInsightsLocation
Classes/RadarUserInsightsLocation.html.abstract: Represents a learned home or work location.

Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html.name: RadarUserInsightsState
Classes/RadarUserInsightsState.html.abstract: Represents the learned home, work, traveling and commuting state of the current user.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
